H0.text: Nephritis is the inflammation of which organ. Pancreas

H1.text: Nephritis is the inflammation of which organ. Liver

H2.text: Nephritis is the inflammation of which organ. Brain

H3.text: Nephritis is the inflammation of which organ. Renal

A4.text: Interstitial nephritis is inflammation of the area of the kidney known as the renal interstitium.
